previewArticle.title: Columbus Crew vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Columbus Crew 2, Montreal Impact 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Crew and Impact are underway at Crew Stadium
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Columbus Crew vs. Montréal Impact

timelineItems.desc: Federico Higuain (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked out for a corner by Krzysztof Krol.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Federico Higuain right footed shot blocked

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt saved. Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Le match est en cours au Crew Stadium. The game is now underway! #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: We are seconds from kickoff and the sun has broken through the clouds for the first time all day in central Ohio.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Federico Higuain (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Federico Higuain gets off an early bicycle kick

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Je ne sais pas pourquoi, mais je m'attends à moins d'occasions à #CLBvMTL en 90 minutes que pour les Belges en 5 minutes contre les USA

timelineItems.name: Gary Hoehn
timelineItems.text: 16 family members at our first crew game together. Won't be our last. #crew96

timelineItems.name: faizayagi
timelineItems.text: New Yorker's first game #crew96

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: 11' I suddenly get the feeling the Crew will have a breakout tonight, but I have no idea why or where it will come from.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact).
Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Waylon Francis has completely terrorized Justin Mapp on the left side for #Crew96. He's shutting Mapp down and making dangerous runs.

timelineItems.name: Theosmy Nasson
timelineItems.text: Je suis vraiment désespéré avec #imfc aucun jeu de transition en récupération du ballon et surtout trop mauvaise passe!!

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Chad Barson (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from very close range is high and wide to the left following a corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Chad Barson whips an open look wide

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 love it when teams try long balls over the top of Parkhurst and Gonzalez. They both deal so well with facing their own goal.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Chad Barson (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from very close range misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Andrés Romero.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Giancarlo González du Costa Rica.. Nostalgie de la Coupe du Monde.. #IMFC #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Barson must finish that. Really unfortunate for him. Bedell's gotta call him off, though. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Columbus Crew. Chad Barson tries a through ball, but Ethan Finlay is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Kaitlyn McGoldrick
timelineItems.text: Woof. We needed that. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Chad Barson has looked a lot more confident in attack in terms of crossing and getting forward lately. #Crew96 needs that w/ Williams out.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Justin Mapp pokes a left-footer wide

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Good to see that Ethan Finlay has picked up the offside slack while Arrieta is out. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Marco Di Vaio.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two Eastern Conference clubs desperate for victories. #CLBvMTL at 7:30ET: http://t.co/31Inup4eXM http://t.co/1kPcqbHuFc

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two Eastern Conference clubs desperate for victories. #CLBvMTL at 7:30ET: http://t.co/31Inup4eXM http://t.co/1kPcqbHuFc

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Set piece off the kickoff for #Crew96... like the idea, but not quite pulled off to perfection.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Adam Bedell with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Jeff Pelletier
timelineItems.text: It's been a couple years, Nordecke. Glad to be back. #Crew96 http://t.co/C6dACFlgLx

timelineItems.name: Jeff Pelletier
timelineItems.text: It's been a couple years, Nordecke. Glad to be back. #Crew96 http://t.co/C6dACFlgLx

timelineItems.name: Delcio Filipe Arruda
timelineItems.text: Non mais c'est quoi ces tentatives de relances de #IMFC!!! Ça fait dur! #IMFCLive #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.name: Cody Sharrett
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp's play is very Eddie Gaven-esque. #Crew96 fortunate his shot goes wide.

timelineItems.name: Ralph Schudel
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio vs Parkhurst is an incredibly fun matchup to watch #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Columbus Crew 2, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Amy Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: 3 POINTS! Wasn't pretty at times, but it still feels good! #crew96

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Clark made a trio of saves during a five or six-minute span halfway through 2H. That made the difference for the Crew. #CLBvMTL #Crew96

timelineItems.name: YMG
timelineItems.text: Ouch! Ça fait mal! Grosse defaite de l'#imfc Les derniers espoirs s'envolent!

timelineItems.name: Cory Aldrich
timelineItems.text: Voice lost. Game won. I'll make that trade every time. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Chase Poole
timelineItems.text: Win for #Crew96

timelineItems.desc: Two Eastern Conference clubs in real need of victories meet when the Columbus Crew square off against the Montréal Impact at Crew Stadium.

timelineItems.text: First columbus crew game! #crew96

timelineItems.name: KC
timelineItems.text: No Montréal Impact players named for the #MLSAllStar... On that note, let's hope for a win tonight. #IMFC

timelineItems.text: #Crew96 ✌️�

timelineItems.text: Wish he was on pitch but my photo w @wil_trapp will make women in my fam jealous #crew96 @ColumbusCrew

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Est-ce que je suis prêt à perdre un autre 90 minutes de ma vie? Allez Montréal! Prove me wrong #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Alex Cayer
timelineItems.text: Ma prédiction : Un bon 3-1 pour le Crew. Bye bye les séries #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Amy Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: Still dislike short corners. #CREW96

timelineItems.name: F.D. Laramée
timelineItems.text: Alors, Piatti, on le fait jouer dans l'axe pour construire un peu ou on le laisse sur l'aile et on cherche ailleurs? #imfc

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: Sit Pearce #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Little things are really killing #Crew96 tonight. Miscommunication, not calling each other off, etc.

timelineItems.text: #crew96

timelineItems.name: Kevin Benitez Lafond
timelineItems.text: Tout parait facile pour Columbus et nous cest la guerre! #IMFC #ImpactTVASports Ya pas de jeu que du dechets technique et des degagement...

timelineItems.text: Je n'ai pas de fun à regarder #imfc cette année.

timelineItems.name: Charley Goodwin
timelineItems.text: We like to watch people kicking balls #crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Anor has sent so many shots wide and high tonight they're starting to wrack up frequent flier miles. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Both Barson and Francis are finding loads of space on the flanks when they do push up. Francis in particular looking threatening. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: Dollar brats + dollar beers = dying happy #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Abbey Denniston
timelineItems.text: Crew game with the hubby and bff! #staycation2014 one year wedding anniversary! I love you joey! #crew96

timelineItems.desc: Nick Firchau and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday night match between the Columbus Crew and Montreal Impact. Watch it on MLS Live kicking off at 730pm ET.
timelineItems.title: Columbus Crew vs. Montreal Impact July 19, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: This has been a sharp performance so far by Michael Parkhurst.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew).
Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Columbus Crew 0, Montreal Impact 1. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Marco Di Vaio pounds in a goal after some quality footwork

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Michael Parkhurst makes a slide tackle when #IMFC have 3-on-1 against him. Clutch. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Haiti Hagar
timelineItems.text: Horrible play from #crew96 there.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Federico Higuaín.

timelineItems.name: The AmeriGunner
timelineItems.text: Please stop giving away the ball, #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Mike Fabert
timelineItems.text: I dunno if we suck or Di Vaio is that good, but nice goal. #IMFC #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Oui, Di Vaio est sorti de sa torpeur et ses petits recommencent à être payants. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Marco Di Vaio tries a through ball, but Jack McInerney is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jack Hurley
timelineItems.text: YES lads!!! THATS how we do it!!! #Crew96 #icouldplayonthisteam

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: And as @neilsika just pointed out, the Crew has trailed now conceded first in six of its 10 home games this year. #crew96

timelineItems.name: hickey_jason
timelineItems.text: The Natives ARE Restless #crew96

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Bon Mallace peut entrer maintenant pour préserver la victoire #IMFC #sarcasme

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 1-0. Same story: defensively stout until they're not. Better or worse than #SKC game? More chances, more of #IMFC's repelled. #Crew96 trails

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Le match #CLBvMTL oppose deux équipes malades mais aussi particulièremen faibles offensivement sur les ailes. 0-0 ou miracle ?

timelineItems.comment: Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: J'ai des spasmes à chaque touche longue maintenant. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Waylon Francis has been the best player on the field for #Crew96 tonight without a shadow of a doubt.

timelineItems.comment: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.desc: Offside, Montreal Impact. Andres Romero tries a through ball, but Marco Di Vaio is caught offside.
timelineItems.title: OFFSIDE:Marco Di Vaio is caught a couple steps out in front

timelineItems.name: DKSB17
timelineItems.text: A beautiful goal for those big mean Montreal stupidheads :( #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: The last time #Crew96 led a game, Oberyn Martell was still an undefeated fighter. #GoT #dontgloat

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: The formation changes to give the #Crew96 an offensive skew are only helpful if they keep possession in front of fragmented #backline. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Andrés Romero tries a through ball, but Marco Di Vaio is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Federico Higuain (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked.
timelineItems.title: BLOCK: Federico Higuain's good chance in the box is blocked

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: That Finlay breakaway was the #crew96 offense problems in a nutshell - win possession, get upfield, but fail at crucial moment -> no SOG

timelineItems.name: Jim Sell
timelineItems.text: I’m going to reserve comments until after this match is over. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Adam Bedell.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Krzysztof Krol.

timelineItems.name: Steph Greegor
timelineItems.text: Just a thought here: Not hard to find black&gold (#Crew96) or blue, white&red (#cbj) clothes. So maybe, stop wearing #osu gear to pro games.

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp records his seventh assist of the season and 20th career assist with the Impact, tying Felipe for the team lead #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Lloyd Barker
timelineItems.text: #columbuscrew have not led in a game since May. #MLS #imfc

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: Be interesting to see if Berhalter goes w/ another double #substitution at halftime. Did it against #SKC, mids haven't impressed agnst #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kevan George (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio slices through the Crew defense and makes it 1-0 @impactmontreal. WATCH: http://t.co/MoGAYx5WxJ #CLBvMTL

timelineItems.name: Flick
timelineItems.text: "Tell me, grandpa. Tell me what it was like when #Crew96 scored goals. Was it glorious?"

timelineItems.name: Bob O'Shaughnessy
timelineItems.text: Can’t quite figure out Adam Bedell. Easy to assume he’s a long-ball target but doesn’t get into the air well. #Crew96

timelineItems.text: Pourquoi pas Danso Footy à la place de Ferrari? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: dksb17
timelineItems.text: Underway from Crew Stadium! #Crew96 #BeMassive #GloryToColumbus

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Le Crew Stadium rempli comme à Chivas USA. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Adam Bedell (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ethan Finlay with a cross.

timelineItems.name: François Séguin
timelineItems.text: Le point positif de ce match, c'est aue l'uniforme du Crew est moins dur sur les yeux qu'a l'habitude. #imfc

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: Agustin Viana should be playing in this match. #CLBvMTL

timelineItems.name: Jeff
timelineItems.text: "@bzalaski: Hey, @MLS Live, how 'bout getting that #Crew96 stream back up?" Direct kick out as well

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 54' Goodness, the #Crew96 should be down 2-0. McInerney got the ball in transition, looked to have sure goal, clips it across box WIDE. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: The difference between these teams when on the break is striking. One (MTL) looks decisive & confident. The other (#crew96) looks confused.

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: McInerney misses a golden opportunity to double Montreal's lead. This is starting to feel a little like that 1-1 draw in DC. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Arnaud Dufort
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp est pas pire. #Analyse #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: good blast by Anor - had threatened not more than 5 mins. ago - #IMFC leaving too much space at top of 18 1-1 #Crew96 #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Giancarlo Gonzalez.

timelineItems.name: Bob O'Shaughnessy
timelineItems.text: Third time is the one. Anor buries it. Game on! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Amy Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: Now, to see if we can build on this and not let it slip away #crew96

timelineItems.name: carolynmari
timelineItems.text: CREW SCORES!!!! #crew96

timelineItems.name: Raphaël Larocque-Cyr
timelineItems.text: I blame MLS Live for this Columbus goal. #imfc @MLS

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: If #Crew96 fans thought things were bad now, they could be a lot worse if not for Steve Clark... a Berhalter recruit.

timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bernardo Anor launches a screamer into the back of the net

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: 75' Bernardo Anor...again. From almost the exact same spot, and the Crew has a lead. Huge. Huge huge huge.

timelineItems.name: #GoLesFrancais
timelineItems.text: Aucune pression sur Anor #imfc #imfclive

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: Golazo de Añor. El segundo y el #Crew96 le da la vuelta al juego ante el #IMFC #VenEx

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Bernardo Anor can kick the ball really hard. #Crew96 lead 2-1.

timelineItems.name: Flick
timelineItems.text: The goals will come era has arrived! Next stop, MLS Cup, suckas! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Boba Bettis
timelineItems.text: GOOOOAALLLL!!! 2-1 #Crew96 http://t.co/QlDHyZ3viG

timelineItems.name: Boba Bettis
timelineItems.text: GOOOOAALLLL!!! 2-1 #Crew96 http://t.co/QlDHyZ3viG

timelineItems.name: Pele
timelineItems.text: #IMFC can't defend for their lives. All credit to Anor for a golasso though

timelineItems.comment: Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: N. J. King
timelineItems.text: We are winning. Yes, I just said it: we're WINNING! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: carolynmari
timelineItems.text: CREW GOAL #2!!!!!!! #crew96

timelineItems.name: ImpactSoccer.com
timelineItems.text: Tu marques une fois contre #IMFC, tu réessayes la même chose, tu marques une deuxième fois. Après KC, Columbus le prouve cette semaine.

timelineItems.name: Alek Avendaño
timelineItems.text: Les ratés de Jack Mac commencent à faire mal. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Tony Tchani.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.
Attempt missed. Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Federico Higuaín following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Football Cyber Cafe
timelineItems.text: Been attacking tough so far! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Attendance for tonight's game, 21,112. #Crew96 with the sellout

timelineItems.name: Mathieu Roy
timelineItems.text: Après Dwyer, c'est maintenant Anor qui gonfle ses stats offensives contre #IMFC.

timelineItems.name: NatashaOjedaBanditto
timelineItems.text: Lets just let everyone have a run at goal with no one to close them down. Good strategy! #imfc #sarcasm

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Impact now playing a 4-1-3-2 with Felipe at holding mid. Yup. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: This looks like four corners basketball. Crew passing all around the field and Montreal powerless to do anything about it.

timelineItems.name: NatashaOjedaBanditto
timelineItems.text: Why are we not making changes!!! We are losing and its the 84th minute! #imfc

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Mallace? Why? #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Maxime Bélanger
timelineItems.text: J'ai bien fais de pas acheter mes billets de saison cette année ! #imfc #imfclive #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: This feels like a kid playing FIFA. Lets just put a lot of attacking players on the field and see what happens. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Federico Higuaín.

timelineItems.name: SOCKAH
timelineItems.text: Is praying to the goddess Nike an option here? I feel an Impact goal approaching #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Amy Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: Let's go back to playing keepaway just on the other side of midfield #crew96

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Montreal has been trying to sub two players in for the last four minutes at least.

timelineItems.name: Albert
timelineItems.text: Mallace is about to come in. This is known as, "the opponent is about to score.." #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Michael Parkhurst.

timelineItems.name: Riley
timelineItems.text: First ever #Crew96 game! This is amazing! I love you beautiful people!

timelineItems.name: Nikki Sabato
timelineItems.text: I believe that we will win #crew96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew).
Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Calum Mallace rips a shot high

timelineItems.name: F.D. Laramée
timelineItems.text: La semaine passée, Klopas faisait rentrer des joueurs défensifs pour protéger la nulle. Aujourd'hui c'est pour protéger la défaite. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: C'est le couloir de la mort les matches de #IMFC. Tu sais que tu y vas tout droit, ça dure longtemps et la fin est toujours la même.

timelineItems.name: Charlie Lapin
timelineItems.text: Seems like a white flag to me. RT @nicksabetti: What was the point of taking off Bernier exactly? #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Andrea A.¤
timelineItems.text: No better way than to spend a summer night, than with the Crew, on a winning evening. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Sean Donahue
timelineItems.text: Someone buy Anor a fruit basket or something #crew96

timelineItems.name: Matteo Maldini
timelineItems.text: Something seriously wrong with #IMFC this is getting ridiculous now

timelineItems.name: Tom Lillis IV
timelineItems.text: ##Crew96 @AshleighIgnelzi asking "What do I say after a home win? It's been so long I forgot" ⚽️ http://t.co/CEanegcwIZ
